channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Threat of Chinese Overcapacity Looms Over Memory Chips
item.description: Vital technology component could be next industry to grapple with abundance from Asian country.

item.title: Nasdaq Futures Edge Down and Bond Yields Rise
item.description: Stock futures were muted in early trading ahead of a busy week for earnings.

item.title: ASML just gave us a first glimpse into how U.S. chip export curbs will dent its China sales
item.description: ASML on Tuesday offered the first glimpse into how U.S. restrictions on exports of its advanced chip manufacturing tools to China will impact its sale...

item.title: Nvidia and Apple supplier TSMC shares pop after quarterly profit soars on AI demand
item.description: TSMC, the worldâ€™s largest producer of advanced chips, posted a 54% hike in third-quarter profit.

item.title: Netflix third-quarter subscribers barely beat estimates as ad-tier members jump 35%
item.description: Netflix's ad-tier memberships jumped 35%. The company is on track to launch the service in Canada in the coming quarter and more broadly in 2025.

item.title: Here's a rapid-fire update on all 33 portfolio stocks, including our 2 newest positions
item.description: Jim Cramer broke down each holding Wednesday during the October Monthly Meeting.

item.title: Fed Rate Cuts Could Boost Municipal Bonds

item.title: So You Have Decided to Buy Bonds. Here Are Six Charts Showing Your Options.
item.description: Plain-vanilla Treasury bonds are now pricey, but there are corners of fixed-income market where investors may be able to get a bit more yield and even...

item.title: Procter & Gamble earnings beat estimates, but weak demand in China hurts sales
item.description: Procter & Gamble said volume fell in its Greater China market despite the earnings beat.

item.title: Gold Futures Hit Record Ahead of Brics De-dollarization Talks
item.description: Gold futures rose as Brics nations prepare for de-dollarization talks. Russia is pushing for a new global financial-payments system to dent U.S. domin...
